name: Giant Weasel
description: The Giant Weasel has a long, sleek body with sharp teeth, making it an efficient predator. It is known for its agility and stealth.
memorable: Its ability to steal items from larger prey without being detected adds a clever twist to encounters.
goals: Typically hunts small to medium-sized prey in forests or grasslands.
relations: Often found alongside other forest creatures, but not particularly aggressive towards larger animals unless threatened.
strengths: Exceptional stealth and keen hearing and smell allow it to be an effective hunter.
weaknesses: Low hit points make it fragile in direct confrontations.
attacks: Makes a Bite attack dealing piercing damage, can also use a Grab attack to restrain foes.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Hearing and Smell grants advantage on Perception checks relying on these senses.
senses: Possesses heightened perception abilities, particularly with hearing and smell.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, allowing it to detect hidden foes and move quietly.
additional_information: Can release a foul-smelling spray that poisons nearby creatures.
Able to navigate well in low-light conditions with darkvision.
Highly effective at grappling and incapacitating prey.
Not naturally aggressive but defends itself fiercely if threatened.
test_queries: sneaky forest predator with keen senses
agile creature that hunts small animals
weasel that can steal items and grapple foes
stealthy beast with strong hearing and smell
quick predator in grasslands or forests
